amendment.description: Amendment makes river rescue organizations eligible for funding under the definition of a rescue organization.
amendment.purpose: An amendment printed in Part B of House Report 111-340 to make river rescue organizations eligible for funding under the definition of a rescue organization.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Holden amendment (A004) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A004) offered by Mr. Holden.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Holden amendment (A004) Agreed to by voice vote.
